node.html: This is the official Orascom Holding Development (ODH) website, representing their destinations worldwide, their statistics, press releases, and so on. I worked on translating the UI design into a responsive and performant website.

Walima brand was founded in 2003 providing customers and consumers with high-quality frozen vegetables, fruits, french fries, and cheese range at affordable prices.

A responsive interface that works perfectly on different screen sizes, with a simple yet neat animation to enhance the user experience.
Sunbulah Group, one of the largest Food and Fine-Pastries manufacturing companies in Saudi Arabia and The Middle East.
Visualization for COVID-19 data around the world using JHU (John Hopkins University) API.
El-Dokkan is a responsive E-Commerce website providing different products.

Claquette is a Singla Page Application (SPA) Movie and Tv database with categories to give the user a good and smooth surfing experience. I have built the app using Angular framework , TMDB API & third-party dependencies: Bootstrap, Font-awesome, Owl-carousel.
UI Design for a web developer portfolio with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
A simple CRUD system for products, inputs validation with RegEx.
A simple user-friendly smart login system with RegEx validation.
A Template for a Full-Stack Developer, built with HTML, CSS, JS and Bootstrap, with a responsive Design.

Weathery is a simple weather-forecasting app that provides the user with the most useful info. for weather in his city or any other city in the world, with a TripAdvisor redirection to help if he wants to visit this city.
UI Design for a web developer portfolio with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
